title: BIG BUCK BUNNY
description: Big Buck Bunny is a short computer-animated comedy film by the Blender Institute, part of the Blender Foundation. Like the foundation's previous film Elephants Dream, the film was made using Blender, a free software application for animation made by the same foundation. It was released as an open-source film under Creative Commons License Attribution 3.0. It premiered in the Netherlands and online on 10 April 2008.
